CustomField.description: Defines if the "Approve" buttons in the Timesheet Manager are available for use. If True, they will be hidden. When hidden, specific Users can be given access to use the buttons via the 'Enable Timesheet Manager Approve' field on the User object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if the "Approve" buttons in the Timesheet Manager are available for use. If True, they will be hidden. When hidden, specific Users can be given access to use the buttons via the 'Enable Timesheet Manager Approve' field on the User object.
CustomField.label: Hide Timesheet Manager Approve
